flawed_nl_solution:
If a bunny comes out of its hole three times in a minute, in an hour, with 60 minutes, the bunny will come out of the hole 60*3=<<60*3=180>>180 times.
In 10 hours, a bunny will come out of their hole 180*10=<<180*10=180>>180 times.
The combined time that 20 bunnies coming out of their holes will have taken in 10 hours is 180*20=<<180*20=3600>>3600 times.
#### 3600

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1800, not 180. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
